companyInfo.name: MAGNUM TECHNOLOGY
companyInfo.description: We are driven by a passion for leveraging technology and automation systems.
companyInfo.mission: We specialize in developing innovative, tailored engineering solutions, with meticulous attention to detail. We are dedicated to providing professional and highly functional designs that address the unique requirements of clients across industries.

coreStrength.title: Our Core Strength
points: Review and identify problems in strong collaboration with client teams (at all levels of the organization)
Propose and develop technical solutions, including creation of technical drawings, designs, and blueprints
Work closely with execution teams to support the production process
Manage subcontractors and overall project execution
Demonstrate discipline, strong organization, attention to detail, innovative thinking, and excellent communication skills

credentials.title: Credentials:
qualifications: Master of Science: Virtual Engineering and Competitive Manufacturing
Bachelor of Mechanical Engineering: Machine Building
13+ years of experience Partners that endorse Florin's professionalism, skills, and expertise: Global: Romania (Cluj, Sibiu, Oradea, Bistrița, Bucharest), United Kingdom, Austria, Spain, China, UAE
companies: Select companies: Emerson, Accenture, Bosch, NTT, ULMA Packaging, TURBOMECANICA, CSi Romania, GRUPO PACADAR, Tehnosteel Industry SRL, Bertrandt Group
roles: Job titles: Group CEO, Country Managing Director, Data Engineer, Mechanical Design Engineer, Production Engineer, Quality Assurance Specialist, Software Engineer, Program Manager, Marketing Manager, Topographic Engineer

portfolio.title: PORTFOLIO
portfolio.description: Over the years, we have had the privilege to collaborate with leading companies and deliver engineering solutions that combine technical expertise with practical, real-world impact. Our work reflects a balance between creativity, efficiency, and attention to detail ensuring every project meets the highest standards of quality.

contact.title: CONTACT US
contact.description: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have questions, need more information about our services, or want to discuss a potential project, our team is here to help.
